title: Organic Cotton Kurta Set
description: Handwoven organic cotton kurta with traditional block prints. Made by artisans in Rajasthan using natural dyes.

title: Bamboo Fiber Bedsheet Set
description: Ultra-soft bamboo fiber bedsheets that are naturally antibacterial and temperature regulating.

title: Handcrafted Copper Water Bottle
description: Pure copper water bottle with Ayurvedic benefits. Handcrafted by traditional artisans.

title: Organic Turmeric Face Pack
description: Natural turmeric and neem face pack made from organic ingredients grown in Kerala.

title: Jute Shopping Bag Set
description: Set of 3 eco-friendly jute bags with traditional Indian prints. Perfect for sustainable shopping.

title: Khadi Cotton Saree
description: Handspun khadi cotton saree with natural indigo dye. Supporting traditional weavers.

title: Wooden Kitchen Utensil Set
description: Set of 5 wooden kitchen utensils made from sustainable mango wood. Chemical-free finish.

title: Herbal Hair Oil
description: Ayurvedic hair oil with coconut, amla, and bhringraj. Made using traditional cold-press method.

title: Handwoven Cotton Throw
description: Soft cotton throw with traditional Indian motifs. Perfect for adding warmth and style.

title: Organic Honey Collection
description: Set of 3 organic honey varieties from different regions of India. Raw and unprocessed.
